name: Bubsy in a Pawtaform
description:
This is a Prototype of a Bubsy Fan Game.
The main idea of this, is to rework the base of the game and actually make it a decent plataforming game.
In this Prototype you can: (basically is a 2 minutes tutorial level, for now...)
*Jump
*Glide
*Walk
*Move Camera
*Move Second player (for Testing only)
*pick some stuff

In case someone can't tell, this is NOT an official Bubsy game. I have no affiliation with the owners of Bubsy; this is just a fan-made game.

If you play this game on your YouTube channel, please leave a link in the comments so I can see!
